Header.title: Big Data Big Impact
Header.paragraph: Developing intelligent and data-driven solutions to global challenges.

About.paragraph1: We are a Georgia Institute of Technology organization focused on leveraging big data to provide insight into some of the world's greatest challenges, from poverty to climate action.
About.paragraph2: We pride ourselves on offering students valuable opportunities to pursue excellence and growth in computer science and career development.

networkCard.text: Network at social events and more!

analysisRole.title: Analysis
analysisRole.desc: Do you want to be involved with Data Science and Machine and Deep Learning? This role is for you! In this role, you will analyze datasets and develop predictive models that can translate to advancing social impact.

platformRole.title: Platform
platformRole.desc: If you are interested in backend and API development, this role is for you! As a platform developer, you will architect the backend that helps power the projects' web app.

datavizRole.title: DataViz
datavizRole.desc: If you love expressing data in impactful representations, then this role is for you! Incorporating aspects of front-end development and UI-UX design, you will develop compelling visualizations and the frontend that bring the project to life.

Gallery.title: Marketing
Gallery.desc: The marketing team exercises its creativity to effectively advertise club events, such as socials, game nights, and more!
Gallery.skills: Graphic design, Event planning, Content creation, Analytics

Gallery.title: Web Development
Gallery.desc: The web development team maintains BDBI's online presence, including designing this website!

Gallery.title: Sponsorship
Gallery.desc: The sponsorship team connects BDBI with local nonprofits and Atlanta-based companies to partner with for data science projects!

Gallery.title: Internal Ops
Gallery.desc: The internal operations team manages club operations and resources, ensuring the best experience for all!
